name: Gambit Shifter (itch)
description:
...you are the pawn and you have to put the king in check.  Simple as that.      The twist? You can shift between pawn types!

Chess inspired Puzzle Game.

A good puzzle, it's a fair thing. Nobody is lying.
It's very clear, and the problem depends just on you.
- Erno Rubik

Relax and enjoy checkmating the king!

  • Use one single pawn
  • Shift between pawn types
  • Get max number of crowns in each level
  • 20 total levels. So far...

The develop is in progress. For now, enjoy this demo and stay tuned!

Developed by Alessio Gallo (Linkedin / Profile)
